overview:
Ilkka is a business builder, whether from the ground up founding businesses or mentoring the new wave of entrepreneurs coming through Australia.

Ilkka has run 3 ASX listed entities, founded, grown, or assisted technology businesses included www.engin.com.au Australia’s leader in broadband telephony, www.anittel.com, 5th fastest growing managed services business in the world, www.mogeneration.com the iPhone and Android application development hothouse and www.myriadgroup.com the largest independent mobile software developer listed on the Swiss stock exchange.
